title: How do i clear sulfur pollution? Pollution of the realms mod
body: Removing the integrated filter of a tank. 3. 8. r/feedthebeast. Join. • 16 days ago. Is there a mod that allows me to copy and paste REALLY large builds to another world like the 1:1 Tokyo Racecourse below? (WorldEdit can copy and save schematics of this world but pasting overloads the game) 357.
readable_content:
- that1superweirdguy (2021-12-08): How do i clear sulfur pollution? Pollution of the realms mod
  My filters only clear carbon pollution, but i also want to get rid of sulfur pollution since in 450 days its quite A lot of sulfur pollution now. Do i need to automate my filters or what? Thanks

- Ba-Na-Nah (2021-12-08):
  You have to use a sulfur filter.
  In the filter gui replace the top(?) Slot with these items.
  Leaf = carbon filter Wool = sulfur filter Paper = dust filter

  - Snoo63 (2021-12-08):
    It is the top.
